title: I can't login on the PBE boards
body:
Everytime I try to login on the PBE boards, the site only recognizes my main account (which is this one) and doesn't let me login with my PBE account (which is Panda goes BOOM).
If I try to logout from my main account, I'm sent to a page with error 404 that invites me to contact the support.

What can I do to fix this problem?

replies.body: That's weird!  What happens if you try another browser or incognito?  There could be an extension getting in the way.  I also suggest clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) just in case something might be failing you to login properly.  Let me know if that helps.

Hi! Thanks for replying and sorry for my late answer.

I can connect normally if I use incognito. I tried to disable chrome extensions but it didn't solve the problem.
